While she is no longer here physically, her spirit is very much present in our work here at the Institute and in the work of like-minded individuals who are using TBRI¬Æ¬†around the world.

We pray we are channeling her in our house for our girls on a daily basis. Though we never met her, Dr. Purvis has changed our lives as foster parents.
